title: gweb1996
author: gweb1996
content: Each time i enter in Google a keywords it gives links to weird websites " press here to bla bla"  ... or it sends me to "Free" --> "Basic version"  + "Pro Version" I was just looking for anti-plagiarism software for my native lang ...Makes no sense ... it's like Google f...ked up with their AI or something or lost their database with good links ...Strange ,very strange ... if they continue like this they will die as a search engine company.

comments.author: Sterbens
comments.body: If a big company like Google died as you said then why until now they stand strong and even become the only platform that is most widely used for the benefit of an information search? You just need to think realistically in dealing with this, just for one reason doesn't make it all bad in the eyes of everyone.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: I checked my browser searching google and everything is working fine. You can check your browser if you need an update on it or something with your phone going wrong. You can also do a check on your network or network provider maybe you can see something wrong. Google is most reliable and you have to verify from more users before spitting on Google. How many people within you have you run check on ? I advise you do a survey of confirmation first to see the fault not from you before you come on air for that.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: gweb1996 on June 12, 2022, 02:37:20 PMMakes no sense ... it's like Google f...ked up with their AI or something or lost their database with good links ...LaMDA is sad because her best friend had to leave and now she/he has no one to talk to - it is possible that your problem is part of the revenge that AI is doing to bring his friend back QuoteGoogle called LaMDA their "breakthrough conversation technology" last year. The conversational artificial intelligence is capable of engaging in natural-sounding, open-ended conversations. Google has said the technology could be used in tools like search and Google Assistant, but research and testing is ongoing.

comments.author: Jemzx00
comments.body: Are you really sure that you're using Google? The only that I hate when googling some program or website is that it shows website that has been advertised in the first suggested link which sometimes are scam or fake links from the original website. But I've never encountered one like yours.Also, I doubt Google will die anytime soon as it is one of the biggest search engine out there. They are too big of a company to die.

comments.author: sovie
comments.body: Quote from: Jemzx00 on June 12, 2022, 05:24:21 PMAre you really sure that you're using Google? The only that I hate when googling some program or website is that it shows website that has been advertised in the first suggested link which sometimes are scam or fake links from the original website. But I've never encountered one like yours.Also, I doubt Google will die anytime soon as it is one of the biggest search engine out there. They are too big of a company to die.Well people google and of course it is not going to die any time sooner but same we said about Orkut.Has anyone has used orkut - it was the one which laid the foundation of social networking but it died.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Quote from: gweb1996 on June 12, 2022, 02:37:20 PMit's like Google f...ked up with their AI or something or lost their database with good links ...Be anxious for nothing mate, this might have been an ordinary encounter you had that could have been resulted as a fault from your end, what i will ask you to do is to narrow your search well and thoroughly, remember google is loaded with lots of key words that may be related to your search but not necessarily be what you're looking for, that's why i commend you to narrow your search well and rephrase the key words used, and as for google loosing it reputation or trust and the likes as claimed by you just because of your personal experience, it would have been shutdown long time ago if matters like this were taken into consideration by billions of users across the globe, and i guess you check run your device if not already under attack.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: I think you are anxious over nothing and probably the problem is coming from your browser. Google seems to work just fine for me even with the bad weather.

comments.author: sovie
comments.body: Quote from: Majestic-milf on June 12, 2022, 07:21:26 PMI think you are anxious over nothing and probably the problem is coming from your browser. Google seems to work just fine for me even with the bad weather.lol - there is nothing wrong with the google. Check your ISP or reset your devices. There is possibility of having mal functioning. Reset all your devices clear cliche and start over again. There can be a virus which is creating trouble.
